text:
JavaScript/UI Engineer - Boomrat (boomrat.com) - Downtown Los Angeles

Boomrat is building an exciting music discovery platform with some amazing partners in the entertainment industry. We're growing our team and are looking for help from a suave, JS MVC friendly, not-just-jquery engineer who can build out a REST-diven UI from scratch.

Competitive pay & benefits - downtown Los Angeles.

ariel@boomrat.com
